page.title: 14LOCAL FOOD
page.content:
The easiest way to describe the local diet is to show what a local person would eat in one day. {Breakfast_}cereal,toast and either tea or coffee.Sometimes people take a fry which consists of eggs,bacon,sausages, soda and potato bread. {Lunch_}soup or sandwiches. {Dinner_}a meal which consists of meat, potatoes and vegetables.
Local food would mainly be{Soda bread, {Potato bread}and{Wheaten bread.}These items have always been part of a Ballycastle person's diet. These are common products of{Northern {Ireland}but have recently been introduced to Great Britain where they have proved to be very popular.
